definition: Hekou district of Dongying city 東營市|东营市[Dong1 ying2 shi4], Shandong
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
Shahekou district of Dalian 大連市|大连市[Da4 lian2 shi4], Liaoning

sentences.english: The essay made a specific plan for a city wetland system in HeKou for example.
sentences.chinese: 以河口區爲例，進行了具體的城市溼地體系的規劃。

sentences.english: River input is the most important source of suspended particles.
sentences.chinese: 河流輸入是河口區懸浮顆粒的主要來源。

sentences.english: Now is the Party branch secretary that warden of Dalian city sanded bayou starts the market.
sentences.chinese: 現在是大連市沙河口區長興市場的黨支部書記。
